item.title: Behind the Scenes of PyBites - a Blog for Passionate Pythonistas (Post #100 Special)
item.description: Python is hot according to Dice. It’s an easy language to learn, has an elegant design and is widely used. In this article we proudly present our now 4 months journey into building PyBites. It’s a reflection of what we achieved and lessons learned. We hope to inspire fellow developers to start their own venture. It is very rewarding!
